Maybe that's pretentious to say\, but contrary to what we were prompted to think the game was about\, I don't think this game ever was 100% about vengeance and hate. This left me the same way the first game did - constantly thinking about it days after completion.I will say the length felt very dragged at times\, this felt due to incredible amounts of gameplay without sufficient breathers.
